attributes.action: Take control of the immigration crisis.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Immigration is reaching crisis point. The population is rising dramatically, not due to births but because of the number of people flooding in to this country. I believe that people should be able to move around and I don't want to see an end to immigration, but I believe it should be controlled tighter than it is at present.
We are a crowded country anyway, with a struggling public services system, the government needs to take control of this now before it gets any worse.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
